greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = number of partitions of n with k circular successions (n>=0, 0 <= k <= n).
link: T. Mansour, A. O. Munagi, Set partitions with circular successions, European Journal of Combinatorics, 42 (2014), 207-216.
mathematica: t[n_, k_] := Binomial[n, k]*((-1)^(n-k)+Sum[(-1)^(j-1)*BellB[n-k-j], {j, 1, n-k}]); t[0, 0]=0; t[1, 0]=1; t[1, 1]=0; Table[t[n, k], {n, 0, 10}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 09 2014 *)
xref: A124323 is an essentially identical triangle, differing only in row 0 and 1.
For columns see A000296, A250105 - A250107.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 16 2014
